Header.title: Pet Name Generator
Header.description: Upload a photo of your adorable pet and let our AI suggest the perfect names! Our smart system analyzes your pet's appearance to create personalized name suggestions.

EmptyState.title: Upload a photo to get started!
EmptyState.description: Your pet's perfect name is just one upload away.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Our advanced AI analyzes your pet's photo to understand their unique characteristics.

personalizedNames.title: Personalized Names
personalizedNames.description: Get custom name suggestions that match your pet's appearance and personality.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Receive multiple creative name suggestions in seconds, ready for your new companion.

Metadata.title: Pet Name Generator - AI-Powered Pet Naming
Metadata.description: Upload a photo of your pet and get personalized name suggestions powered by AI. Perfect names for dogs, cats, and all your beloved pets.
Metadata.keywords: pet names, dog names, cat names, AI pet naming, pet name generator, animal names, pet photo analysis
